contentList.content: Demon hunters, disciples of Illidan Stormrage, uphold a dark legacy, one that frightens their allies and enemies alike. The Illidari embrace fel and chaotic magics energies that have long threatened the world of Azeroth, believing them necessary to challenge the Burning Legion.
A brooding master of warglaives and the destructive power of Fel magic.
Embraces the demon within to incinerate enemies and protect their allies.
Fury is the primary resource used by Demon Hunters and is required for the execution of most of their damage abilities. Fury can be generated by certain Demon Hunter abilities.

Your maximum Fury is increased to [1].
Fury is the primary resource used by Demon Hunters and is required for the execution of most of their damage abilities. Fury can be generated by certain Demon Hunter abilities.

Leap into the air and land with explosive force, dealing [1] to enemies within [2].
Upon landing, you are transformed into a hellish demon for [3] rounds.
You are transformed into a powerful demon. Your attacks gain advantage and ignore target's fire resistance. You also gain 25% increased Dexterity and Charisma.
Can't be casted while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WoWDH_POLYMORPH_DEMONFORM_F">Metamorphosis</LSTag> is active.
Allows you to see enemies that are stealthed and invisible within [1].
Taunts the target to attack you.
Throw a demonic glaive at the target, dealing [1]. The glaive can ricochet to 1 additional enemies within [2], up to 3 times.
Engulf yourself in flames, radiating [1] within [2].
While Active: Generates 10 Fury per turn.

Interrupts the enemy's spellcasting and applies silence for 1 turn.
Spell with 3rd level or lower can always be interrupted. Higher level spells are harder.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 10 turns. Damage will cancel the effect.
Target is incapacitated. Receiving damage will cancel the effect.

Sends a bolt of negative energy that deals [1] and burns a target enemy unit's Spell Slot with highest level. Burned Spell Slot combusts, dealing [2] per Spell Slot level.
If target is a Sorcerer, Mana Burn will combust up to 4 Sorcery Points and deal [2] per Sorcery Point burned.
If target has multiple types of Spell Casting Resource, Mana Burn will combust the highest Level of all available resources.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing [1] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">stunning</LSTag> all nearby enemies within [2] for 1 turn.
Consumes all collected <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DH_Buff_Havoc_SoulFragment">Soul Fragments</LSTag>. Each Soul Fragment consumed heals you for [1] maximum health and generates [2] Fury.

Soul Fragments are dropped from enemies killed by Demon Hunters. <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DH_ChaosStrike">Chaos Strike</LSTag> also has a 5% chance to cleave off a Soul Fragment from the target.
You are possessing Soul Fragments from your enemies. You can hold up to 5 Soul Fragments.

Increases your movement speed by [1].
Your Fire Damage is increased by your Charisma Modifier, and this effect is doubled while your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WoWDH_POLYMORPH_DEMONFORM_F">Metamorphosis</LSTag> is active.

While not in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WoWDH_POLYMORPH_DEMONFORM_F">Metamorphosis</LSTag>, casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_DH_EyeBeam">Eye Beam</LSTag> causes you to enter <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WoWDH_POLYMORPH_DEMONFORM_F">Metamorphosis</LSTag> for 2 turns.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DH_ChaosStrike">Chaos Strike</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DH_BladeDance">Blade Dance</LSTag> hits have a [1] chance to reduce <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_DH_EyeBeam">Eye Beam</LSTag> cooldown by 1 turn.

While in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WoWDH_POLYMORPH_DEMONFORM_F">Metamorphosis</LSTag>, you have a chance of [1] per fury spent to extend your active <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WoWDH_POLYMORPH_DEMONFORM_F">Metamorphosis</LSTag> by 1 turn.
Entering Metamorphosis immediately grants you free <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DH_BladeDance">Blade Dance</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_DH_EyeBeam">Eye Beam</LSTag>.
Slice your target for [1]. Chaos Strike has a [2] chance to refund 20 Fury.
On a hit with a melee weapon, deal additional [1]. Chaos Strike has a [2] chance to refund 20 Fury.
On a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a melee weapon, deal additional [1]. Chaos Strike has a [2] chance to refund 20 Fury.
Rush forward, incinerating anything in your path for [1]. Fel Rush can be cast again for free within the same turn.
Blasts all enemies in front of you for [1]. Deals guaranteed critical strike during <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WoWDH_POLYMORPH_DEMONFORM_F">Metamorphosis</LSTag>.
Strike nearby enemies 5 times with both weapons, dealing [1] per strike. The last strike deals 100% additional damage.

Requires dual wielding melee weapons.
Cooldown: 2 turns.
Your weapon attacks deal an additional [1] and generate 5-10 Fury.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for [1]. Heals you for 50% damage done.
The Azzinoth's Flame imbued within this weapon grows as you levels, dealing additional [1].
Your melee attacks have a [1] chance to grant you Haste for 2 turns, this chance is doubled while you are in Demon Form. (Requires LV 6 Demon Hunter)

Havoc: When casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_DH_EyeBeam">Eye Beam</LSTag>, you can cast a free <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_DH_FelDevastation">Fel Devastation</LSTag>. Vengeance: When casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_DH_FelDevastation">Fel Devastation</LSTag>, you can cast a free <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_DH_EyeBeam">Eye Beam</LSTag>. (Requires LV 12 Demon Hunter)

Creature has a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and it can take one additional action per turn.
